contentrichtext.text: '''George Allen''' may refer to: * [[George Allen (defensive tackle)]] (born 1944), American college and professional football player * [[George Allen (American football coach)]] (1918–1990), American football coach * [[George E. Allen]] (1896–1973), American political operative who was involved in a famous football game while in college * [[George E. Allen (coach)]] (1911–1997), American football player and coach of football and basketball * [[George Allen (footballer)]] (born 1932), former English professional footballer * [[George Allen (ice hockey)]] (1914–2000), Canadian professional ice hockey player * [[George Allen (Australian politician)]] (1800–1877), Mayor of Sydney and NSW politician * [[George Allen (U.S. politician)]] (born 1952), former Virginia Governor and U.S. Senator * [[George Allen (Vermont)]] (1808–1876), noted college professor and clergyman * [[George Allen (New Zealand politician)]] (1814–1899), Mayor of Wellington, New Zealand for three weeks * [[George E. Allen, Sr.]] (1885–1972), Virginia state senator and U.S. Supreme Court trial attorney * [[George E. Allen, Jr.]] (1914–1990), Virginia attorney * [[Gubby Allen]] (sir George Oswald Browning Allen, 1902–1989), Australian-born English cricketer * [[George V. Allen]] (1903–1970), United States diplomat * [[George Wigram Allen]] (1824–1885), Australian politician * [[George Frederic Allen]] (1837–1929), New Zealand architect, surveyor, teacher and tourist guide * [[George Nelson Allen]] (1812–1877), American composer and geologist * [[George Allen (cricketer)]] (1949–1990), West Indian cricketer * [[George Warner Allen]] (1916–1988), British artist * [[George Allen and Sons]], publishers ==See also== * [[George Allan (disambiguation)]] * [[Georg Frederik Ferdinand Allen]] (1856–1925), Danish singing teacher, conductor and composer * {{intitle|George Allen}} * {{intitle|George Alan}} {{hndis|Allen, George}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Allen, George}}
